meanings.definition: A harsh, discordant mixture of sounds.
meanings.sent1: The cacophonies of car horns and construction work filled the air.
meanings.sent2: The cacophonies of the city streets could be overwhelming at times.
meanings.sent3: The cacophonies of the animals in the zoo made the visitors giggle.
meanings.sent4: The cacophonies of nature's symphony clashed in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The cacophonies of the orchestra tuning their instruments echoed through the hall.

meanings.sent1: The cacophonies of the alarm clock startled him awake.
meanings.sent2: The cacophonies of the thunderstorm kept them up all night.
meanings.sent3: The cacophonies of the squeaky door made her jump every time.
meanings.sent4: The cacophonies of the broken piano keys echoed in the empty room.
meanings.sent5: The cacophonies of the car engine struggling to start filled the garage.
